item.name: Instances
Instances - Get all instances
Instances - Create instance

body.raw:
{
  "id": "{{acc-instance-id}}",
  "name": "ACC Instance Name",
  "dockerImage": "{{acc-serve-docker-image}}",
  "state": null,
  "event": {
    "id": "91098aa8-3f7d-4e98-bcbd-82d2398de655",
    "name": "ACC Event Name",
    "track": "mount_panorama",
    "preRaceWaitingTimeSeconds": 80,
    "sessionOverTimeSeconds": 120,
    "ambientTemp": 22,
    "trackTemp": 30,
    "cloudLevel": 0.1,
    "rain": 0.0,
    "weatherRandomness": 1,
    "postQualySeconds": 10,
    "postRaceSeconds": 15,
    "metaData": "mount_panorama",
    "sessions": [
      {
        "id": "b754c180-70f3-4edf-ae4d-f037b6fe0604",
        "hourOfDay": 6,
        "dayOfWeekend": 2,
        "timeMultiplier": 1,
        "sessionType": "P",
        "sessionDurationMinutes": 10
      },
      {
        "id": "0555866f-10ab-45bf-b569-d8ce280ed9cc",
        "hourOfDay": 12,
        "dayOfWeekend": 2,
        "timeMultiplier": 1,
        "sessionType": "Q",
        "sessionDurationMinutes": 10
      },
      {
        "id": "4d09688d-fe20-407a-bf13-0a7c05117ce9",
        "hourOfDay": 18,
        "dayOfWeekend": 3,
        "timeMultiplier": 2,
        "sessionType": "R",
        "sessionDurationMinutes": 20
      }
    ],
    "configVersion": 1
  },
  "eventRules": {
    "id": "0be87ff1-ce8a-4f9a-861f-8fe48bc57057",
    "qualifyStandingType": 1,
    "superpoleMaxCar": -1,
    "pitWindowLengthSec": -1,
    "driverStintTimeSec": -1,
    "mandatoryPitstopCount": 0,
    "maxTotalDrivingTime": -1,
    "maxDriversCount": 1,
    "isRefuellingAllowedInRace": true,
    "isRefuellingTimeFixed": false,
    "isMandatoryPitstopRefuellingRequired": false,
    "isMandatoryPitstopTyreChangeRequired": false,
    "isMandatoryPitstopSwapDriverRequired": false,
    "tyreSetCount": 50
  },
  "entriesList": {
    "id": "11c8f89b-3745-4cc5-905b-1dc0c1464281",
    "entries": [
      {
        "drivers": [
          {
            "id": "35662497-1211-418d-918f-e405582f99d6",
            "firstName": "ExampleOne",
            "lastName": "Example",
            "shortName": "NicknameOne",
            "driverCategory": 3,
            "playerID": "s*****************"
          },
          {
            "id": "dccd1e18-b460-4759-b246-239d7094a92b",
            "firstName": "ExampleTwo",
            "lastName": "Example",
            "shortName": "NicknameTwo",
            "driverCategory": 3,
            "playerID": "s*****************"
          }
        ],
        "raceNumber": -1,
        "forcedCarModel": -1,
        "overrideDriverInfo": 1,
        "customCar": "9-200321-103118.json",
        "overrideCarModelForCustomCar": 0,
        "isServerAdmin": 1,
        "defaultGridPosition": -1,
        "ballastKg": 0,
        "restrictor": 0
      },
      {
        "drivers": [
          {
            "id": "336df5dd-ac5a-4f55-944f-06492ed4cad5",
            "firstName": "ExampleThree",
            "lastName": "Example",
            "shortName": "NicknameThree",
            "driverCategory": 0,
            "playerID": "s*****************"
          }
        ],
        "raceNumber": -1,
        "forcedCarModel": -1,
        "overrideDriverInfo": 1,
        "customCar": "9-200321-103118.json",
        "overrideCarModelForCustomCar": 0,
        "isServerAdmin": 1,
        "defaultGridPosition": -1,
        "ballastKg": 0,
        "restrictor": 0
      }
    ],
    "forceEntryList": 0,
    "configVersion": 1
  },
  "assists": {
    "id": "045fac40-d440-4e82-805a-e4c98c455fd0",
    "stabilityControlLevelMax": 25,
    "disableAutosteer": 1,
    "disableAutoLights": 0,
    "disableAutoWiper": 0,
    "disableAutoEngineStart": 0,
    "disableAutoPitLimiter": 0,
    "disableAutoGear": 0,
    "disableAutoClutch": 0,
    "disableIdealLine": 0
  },
  "bop": {
    "id": "6f2454e5-0e46-43e5-acda-556e5b71cd86",
    "entries": [
      {
        "id": "4f608672-ff99-4281-a0b0-52994a80ea20",
        "track": "zolder",
        "carModel": 7,
        "ballastKg": 1,
        "restrictor": 2
      },
      {
        "id": "8de8f11c-b762-4973-9da0-403b2570e549",
        "track": "silverstone",
        "carModel": 2,
        "ballastKg": 0,
        "restrictor": 5
      }
    ],
    "disableAutosteer": 1,
    "disableAutoLights": 0,
    "disableAutoWiper": 0
  },
  "config": {
    "id": "d9d97d05-92d6-4cba-9382-3b0697b6d43c",
    "tcpPort": 9232,
    "udpPort": 9231,
    "registerToLobby": 1,
    "maxConnections": 85,
    "lanDiscovery": 1,
    "configVersion": 1
  },
  "settings": {
    "id": "6b41ffcc-7a39-4592-bd6e-10e62c5463b9",
    "serverName": "Testing Server 1",
    "adminPassword": "adminPassword123",
    "carGroup": "FreeForAll",
    "trackMedalsRequirement": 0,
    "safetyRatingRequirement": -1,
    "racecraftRatingRequirement": -1,
    "password": "",
    "spectatorPassword": "",
    "maxCarSlots": 30,
    "dumpLeaderboards": 0,
    "isRaceLocked": 1,
    "isPrepPhaseLocked": 0,
    "randomizeTrackWhenEmpty": 1,
    "centralEntryListPath": "",
    "allowAutoDQ": 0,
    "shortFormationLap": 1,
    "dumpEntryList": 0,
    "formationLapType": 3,
    "doDriverSwapBroadcast": 1,
    "configVersion": 1
  }
}
